arStrings.szText: Please! You have to help! He's out there somewhere!
Manic. Your son is the most important thing in the world to you and he's been missing for days
I'm sorry Damen, we just don't have the folks to go searching for every boy who's stayed out past his bedtime. He'll turn up, I'm sure of it.
Empathetic, but pragmatic. Trying to talk a frightened father off the emotional cliff. Kids go 'missing' often, and return home safe after a few hours.
